医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ADAMTS13 缺乏导致吡咯里西啶生物碱诱导的肝损伤中血小板聚集吡咯里西啶生物碱（PA）广泛分布于植物中，已知会诱发肝衰竭。据报道，PA 诱导的肝损伤 (PA-ILI) 进展过程中会出现肝血小板聚集。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/ADAMTS13-deficiency-drives-platelet-accumulation-in-pyrrolizidine-alkaloid-induced-liver-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/ADAMTS13-deficiency-drives-platelet-accumulation-in-pyrrolizidine-alkaloid-induced-liver-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5ec1d60-9a84-46f8-b254-25e9c74f0bf3 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 21:54:44 -0500 ADAMTS13 deficiency drives platelet accumulation in pyrrolizidine alkaloid-induced liver injury
研究表明西方饮食与慢性炎症和结直肠癌的生长有关结直肠癌是美国癌症相关死亡的第二大原因，我们盘子里的食物可能会加剧结直肠癌的发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Study-links-Western-diet-to-chronic-inflammation-and-colorectal-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Study-links-Western-diet-to-chronic-inflammation-and-colorectal-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2a4a079-d9c5-4740-89d3-d0584ade8adc Tue, 10 Dec 2024 21:51:17 -0500 Study links Western diet to chronic inflammation and colorectal cancer growth
纳米孔测序揭示癌症分子指纹以加快诊断速度根据今天发表在《分子》杂志上的一项研究，不同类型的癌症具有独特的分子“指纹”，这些分子“指纹”可以在疾病的早期阶段检测到，并且可以通过小型便携式扫描仪在短短几个小时内以近乎完美的精度检测出来。细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Nanopore-sequencing-reveals-cancers-molecular-fingerprint-for-faster-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Nanopore-sequencing-reveals-cancers-molecular-fingerprint-for-faster-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=000c5086-ba15-4f51-ab29-53acdb17d6ea Tue, 10 Dec 2024 21:47:15 -0500 Nanopore sequencing reveals cancer's molecular fingerprint for faster diagnosis
新的 140 万美元拨款支持创新的肾癌治疗策略威尔康奈尔医学公司 (Weill Cornell Medicine) 获得美国国防部 140 万美元的为期四年的资助，用于研究一种针对最常见肾癌的新治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/New-2414M-grant-supports-innovative-kidney-cancer-treatment-strategy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/New-2414M-grant-supports-innovative-kidney-cancer-treatment-strategy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f033c0f6-989b-4429-8c38-585d3deece5e Tue, 10 Dec 2024 21:39:57 -0500 New $1.4M grant supports innovative kidney cancer treatment strategy
老年手术验证计划可提高老年癌症患者的术后效果根据发表在《美国外科医生学会杂志》上的一项新研究，实施美国外科医生学会 (ACS) 老年手术验证 (GSV) 计划可以为接受重大腹部手术的老年癌症患者带来更好的术后效果，并保持其独立性https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Geriatric-Surgery-Verification-program-enhances-postoperative-outcomes-for-older-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Geriatric-Surgery-Verification-program-enhances-postoperative-outcomes-for-older-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da29c2cb-62eb-4eb6-9c39-acdfb06f36a1 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 21:38:26 -0500 Geriatric Surgery Verification program enhances postoperative outcomes for older cancer patients
以同理心为重点的电话可改善低收入糖尿病患者的血糖控制德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校戴尔医学院与 Lone Star Circle 合作进行的一项新研究表明，经过培训的非医疗社区成员拨打的以同理心为中心的电话可以显着改善低收入成人糖尿病患者的血糖控制的护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Empathy-focused-phone-calls-improve-blood-sugar-control-for-low-venue-adults-with-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Empathy-focused-phone-calls-improve-blood-sugar-control-for-low-venue-adults-with-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3bda70c-6cb4-4a51-ab92-ad7f2c8cf1b3 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 18:38:10 -0500 Empathy-focused phone calls improve blood sugar control for low-income adults with diabetes
美国成年人的公众意识和 HPV 疫苗接种率仍然较低根据美国国家癌症研究所的数据，人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 是一种常见的性传播感染，占所有喉癌的 70%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Public-awareness-and-HPV-vaccination-rates-remain-low-among-American-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Public-awareness-and-HPV-vaccination-rates-remain-low-among-American-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf5564d3-1833-4457-8cc7-82cdaeaa37f0 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 18:31:45 -0500 Public awareness and HPV vaccination rates remain low among American adults
阿片类药物使用障碍患者的大脑结构和功能发生变化耶鲁大学医学院的研究人员发现阿片类药物使用障碍患者特定大脑区域的结构和功能发生了变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Structural-and-function-brain-changes-found-in-individuals-with-opioid-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Structural-and-function-brain-changes-found-in-individuals-with-opioid-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0da0f23-3b9b-4f44-9add-adfd9479be0c Tue, 10 Dec 2024 18:22:00 -0500 Structural and functional brain changes found in individuals with opioid use disorder
生命早期接触有毒化学物质与大鼠的行为问题有关根据《内分泌学会杂志》上发表的一项新的动物研究，生命早期接触一类名为多氯联苯 (PCB) 的内分泌干扰化学物质 (EDC) 可能会导致大鼠出现行为问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Toxic-chemical-exposure-in-early-life-linked-to-behavioral-problems-in-rats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Toxic-chemical-exposure-in-early-life-linked-to-behavioral-problems-in-rats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ab1d4d6-f119-4488-a08c-620938882d3b Tue, 10 Dec 2024 18:17:38 -0500 Toxic chemical exposure in early life linked to behavioral problems in rats
研究探讨影响家庭护理机器人接受度的因素医学的进步导致人类寿命的延长。据估计，到 2030 年，全球每 6 个人中就有 1 人年龄超过 60 岁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Study-explores-factors-influencing-acceptance-of-home-care-robots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Study-explores-factors-influencing-acceptance-of-home-care-robots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbfd4db0-d3d0-4ad6-b7e4-cd015b2da20e Tue, 10 Dec 2024 18:10:51 -0500 Study explores factors influencing acceptance of home-care robots
